errors.valid:
At least 8 characters
Min one lowercase and uppercase latter
Min one number

texts.forgot_password: Please enter the email address which you used when registering. A password reset link will be sent to this address.
texts.forgot_password_2: A password reset link has been sent to your email. Please use it to reset your password.
texts.ask_partner: Click the button below to be redirected to our friendly Telegram bot, who will ask you several questions to match you with a referring partner best suited for you.
